list.title: 琐碎的家务事
list.share: 我擦不到的地方，你全部包办吧
list.share_en: Honey, can you clean the place out of my reach?

list.title: 和你一起的晚餐
list.share: 想与你分享这一勺的甜蜜
list.share_en: Feed you a sweet meal.

list.title: 弹一首歌给你听
list.share: 甜蜜的歌曲里，有我和你
list.share_en: You and me in the sweet song.

list.title: 路边的水果和猫
list.share: 嘿，你和这只猫咪一样傻呆呆
list.share_en: Look! A cute kitty here.

list.title: 你认真的样子
list.share: 你累吗？那就啵啵思密达吧
list.share_en: Tired? A kiss for you.

list.title: 忘情一吻
list.share: 你的气息，带着引力
list.share_en: I can feel your love.

list.title: 遇见
list.share: 遇见你，会不会是一场美丽的意外
list.share_en: Life is like a box of gift, you never know what you’re gonna get.

list.title: 雨中约会
list.share: 喜欢你为我撑伞的样子
list.share_en: You are the one who opens umbrella for me.

list.title: 简单的幸福
list.share: 星星陪伴着月亮，你陪伴着我
list.share_en: I am here with you as stars with the moon.

list.title: 雨中邂逅
list.share: 你脸红了，是害羞了吗？
list.share_en: Life never changes until our eyes meet.

list.title: 约会
list.share: 哈尼你看那边有城堡，哇～
list.share_en: Darling, Look! A castle over there~

list.title: 黑白配
list.share: 你们看，这小白和老黑太有夫妻相了！
list.share_en: Look! The couple of the two cats.

list.title: 大手牵小手
list.share: 把你的心我的心，串成满屏的粉色泡泡！
list.share_en: Hand in hand with you till the end.

list.title: 森林婚礼
list.share: 你真美，我真幸运！
list.share_en: I spent all of my luck to meet you.

list.title: 宠爱
list.share: 宠让我做你的手臂吧~
list.share_en: Let me take care of you forever.

list.title: 野餐
list.share: 哈尼你看，和我们一样的小乌龟～
list.share_en: Darling~your love is the most delicious food!

list.title: 秋会
list.share: 你的样子，触动了我的心~
list.share_en: My heart melt when I see you.

list.title: 求婚
list.share: 你愿意嫁给我吗？
list.share_en: Will you marry me?

list.title: 爱在萌芽
list.share: 你就是我的仙女吧~
list.share_en: You are my fairy.

list.title: 自然的爱
list.share: 和你在一起，不管怎样都很舒服！
list.share_en: Time freezes at the moment.

list.title: 霸道学长
list.share: 最后一朵花，让我给你戴上！
list.share_en: Let me be the one who protects you.

list.title: 小惊喜
list.share: 你的一朵花，也能让我很开心！
list.share_en: Thanks for the romance you always give me.

list.title: 爱的外卖
list.share: 你看，我买了你最爱喝的汤。
list.share_en: Look, I got your favourite soup.

list.title: 炸薯条
list.share: 你一定要多蘸点番茄酱，会更好吃的~
list.share_en: Honey, how's the taste of the sauce?

list.title: 超人爸爸
list.share: 你的肩膀，让我飞翔
list.share_en: I fly with your shoulder.

list.title: 听奶奶讲故事
list.share: 长大后，我想把全世界讲给你听
list.share_en: I will tell you the world When I grow up.

list.title: 四人晚餐
list.share: 我的眼中，有很多个你
list.share_en: We laughed and chatted happily together.

list.title: 神奇动物
list.share: 你们快看，那是只花豹吗？
list.share_en: Look! A leopard there?!

list.title: 下午茶
list.share: 奶奶说，你要乖乖吃饭才能长高高
list.share_en: Ganny said, "You have to eat to grow tall. "

list.title: 上学第一天
list.share: 妈妈你放心，我在学校一定会很乖乖
list.share_en: Mom, don`t worry, I won't make trouble at school.

list.title: 早餐游戏
list.share: 宝贝你又赢了
list.share_en: Baby, you win again!

list.title: 小帮手
list.share: 妈妈你瞧着，我今天一定卖出去很多甜甜圈
list.share_en: Mom, I am going to sell  a lot of donuts today.

list.title: 惊喜
list.share: 你们快点啦，爸妈快到家了
list.share_en: Be quick! Dad and mom are arriving soon.

list.title: 少女的梦
list.share: 妈妈，你知道我心里有一个开甜甜圈店的梦吗？
list.share_en: Mom, do you know I have a dream of owning a donut shop?

list.title: 采蘑菇
list.share: 爸爸你瞧，好漂亮的蘑菇！
list.share_en: Dad, there are many fresh mushrooms in this forest!

list.title: 清晨
list.share: 妈妈妈妈你慢点，鸟儿们要和我玩儿！
list.share_en: Mommy, I want to play with birds!

list.title: 阅读时光
list.share: 妈妈，你猜我读到了什么厉害的故事？
list.share_en: Mom, guess what terrific story I've just read?

list.title: 海边游泳
list.share: 你不要害怕哦，我在岸边看着你的。
list.share_en: Don't be afraid, I am here watching you!

list.title: 梦境
list.share: 妈妈你知道吗？在梦里我成为了彼得潘。
list.share_en: Mom, I dreamed that I was Peter Pan!

list.title: 出发去打猎
list.share: 你们要乖乖地等我回来噢。
list.share_en: My sweeties, don't worry, I will be back soon!

list.title: 圣诞树
list.share: 爸爸你看，我准备了很多圣诞树的装饰~
list.share_en: Dad, I got a lot of decorations for the tree.

list.title: 生日晚餐
list.share: 第一块蛋糕，你最想和谁分享呢？
list.share_en: Who you want to share with for this cake?

list.title: 两只老虎
list.share: 你不用害怕，有我在
list.share_en: Don't be afraid, I am here！

list.title: 生日聚会
list.share: 你喜欢这个生日大爬梯吗？
list.share_en: How do you like this party?

list.title: 童话故事
list.share: 你们看，书里在讲白马王子吻醒了白雪公主
list.share_en: The Snow White awoke when the prince kissed her!

list.title: 林间奇遇
list.share: 你是谁？小精灵吗？
list.share_en: Who are you? Elf?

list.title: 一起去捕鱼
list.share: 大熊大熊，你背我们过河
list.share_en: Bear, please carry me across the river.

list.title: 夏日时光
list.share: 如痴如醉的微风，仿佛是你的悄然物语
list.share_en: The breeze dances on my cheek.

list.title: 故事大王
list.share: 你们今天想听什么？海蒂还是凯蒂呢？
list.share_en: What stories you like?

list.title: 姐妹郊游
list.share: 快快快，你帮我拍一张，要美噢
list.share_en: HEY! Take a picture for me!

list.title: 灯红酒绿
list.share: 你们的世界，我有时不太明白
list.share_en: Hey, Say Cheese!

list.title: 比萨斜塔
list.share: 小咪，为什么你也斜掉了！
list.share_en: Kitty, let's lean like the tower.

list.title: 屋顶夜色
list.share: 你们快看，有流星！
list.share_en: Look, shooting stars in the Sky!

list.title: 啃西瓜
list.share: 哥哥你看，猫猫也想啃西瓜呢～
list.share_en: Haa...Kitty wants to taste watermelon too.

list.title: 老瓦房
list.share: 你们这群小鸽子，一定是爷爷的朋友吧～
list.share_en: These little pigeons must be friends of my Grandpa.

list.title: 丛林探险
list.share: 你们别怕，我来开路！
list.share_en: Don't be afraid, follow me!

list.title: 雪人宝宝
list.share: 你来串，我来烤，很美味诶！
list.share_en: Do you like the BBQ?

list.title: 舞蹈的仙女
list.share: 你们快看！仙女在跳舞。
list.share_en: Look! A fairy is dancing there!

list.title: 在空中
list.share: 哇！你看，那边的风景好美！
list.share_en: Wow, look at it! So beautiful!
